metadata.title: YouTube Description Templates 2025: Copy-Paste Frameworks
metadata.description: Ready-to-use YouTube description templates. Copy, customize, and optimize your videos.

hero.headline: YouTube Description Templates
hero.subheadline: Ready-to-use frameworks. Stop starting from scratch.

sections.content: A good description template saves time and ensures consistency. Instead of writing from scratch every video, customize proven frameworks that cover SEO essentials, viewer info, and your standard links. Here are templates for different content types you can adapt.

content.title: Hook (First 150 chars)
content.description: Keyword + value prop. Shows in search.

faq.question: How do I set a default description?
faq.answer: YouTube Studio > Settings > Upload defaults > Basic info > Description. Paste your template. Every new upload will start with this. Saves significant time.

faq.question: Should every video have unique description?
faq.answer: Top section should be unique—first 150 characters especially. Standard links, about section can repeat. YouTube understands boilerplate at bottom. Unique + template hybrid is best.

faq.question: How long should descriptions be?
faq.answer: Longer generally better for SEO—200+ words recommended. Front-load unique content. Don't pad with fluff. Template provides structure without sacrificing length.

faq.question: What about timestamps format?
faq.answer: 0:00 Introduction (start at zero). Minimum 3 timestamps. Each section 10+ seconds. YouTube auto-generates chapters from this format. Consistent naming helps.
